FuncDef:
The mldp-p2mp-tunnel command enables a node to create an mLDP P2MP tunnel.
The undo mldp-p2mp-tunnel command enables a node to tear down an mLDP P2MP tunnel.
No mLDP P2MP tunnel is established by default.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the tunnel name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create an mLDP P2MP tunnel, run the mldp-p2mp-tunnel command on the ingress.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the root-ip command to bind a specified mLDP P2MP LSP to the mLDP P2MP tunnel.
